title: A Message from Beyond
text: Reaction: After you refresh, damage this objective to return the topmost enhancement from your discard pile to your hand.

title: Old Ben's Spirit
text:
Enhance a Character unit.
Interrupt: When enhanced unit would be destroyed, instead discard this enhancement and remove all damage from that unit.

title: Old Ben's Spirit
text:
Enhance a Character unit.
Interrupt: When enhanced unit would be destroyed, instead discard this enhancement and remove all damage from that unit.

title: Weapon Mastery
text: Action: A target Character unit gains [Unit Damage] for each enhancement on it until the end of the phase.

title: Calm
text:
Play only during an opponent's turn.
Action: Remove all focus tokens from a target Character unit with 2 or more enhancements on it.

title: Heat of Battle
text: Deal 1 damage to a target participating enemy unit.

title: Hoth Operations
text: While you control more Hoth objectives than your opponent, each of your Speeder units gains edge (1).

title: Wedge Antilles
text: You may play this card on a friendly Speeder or Fighter unit as an enhancement with the text: "Action: Focus this enhancement to remove 1 focus token from enhanced unit."

title: Rogue Three
text: This unit gains [Unit Damage] [Blast Damage] for each enhancement on it.

title: Hoth Survival Gear
text:
Enhance a Character unit.
Enhanced unit gains +1 damage capacity for each Hoth objective you control.

title: Target of Opportunity
text: If you are the attacking player, deal 1 damage to the engaged objective.

title: Echo Base Defense
text:
Limit 1 per objective deck.
While you control more Hoth objectives than your opponent, your Hoth objectives cannot suffer unopposed damage.

title: Wilderness Fighters
text: This unit gains [Unit Damage] for each Hoth objective you control.

title: Wilderness Fighters
text: This unit gains [Unit Damage] for each Hoth objective you control.

title: Wilderness Fighters
text: This unit gains [Unit Damage] for each Hoth objective you control.

title: Subzero Defenses
text:
Enhance your play area.
Destroy the first enemy unit to strike against a friendly Hoth objective each turn, after its strike resolves.

title: Subzero Defenses
text:
Enhance your play area.
Destroy the first enemy unit to strike against a friendly Hoth objective each turn, after its strike resolves.

title: The Killing Cold
text: Action: Sacrifice a unit you control to remove 1 damage from a friendly Hoth objective.

title: Icetromper
text: Action: Sacrifice this unit to remove a target attacking non-Vehicle unit from an engagement. Then, deal 1 damage to that unit.

title: Icetromper
text: Action: Sacrifice this unit to remove a target attacking non-Vehicle unit from an engagement. Then, deal 1 damage to that unit.

title: Fear
text:
Enhance an enemy Character unit. Remove enhanced unit from the Force struggle, if able.
Enhanced unit cannot commit to the Force.

title: The Desolation of Hoth
text:
Play only during your turn.
Action: Move any amount of damage from a Hoth objective you control to a target enemy unit or Hoth objective.

title: Twist of Fate
text: Cancel this edge battle and the card effects of all other fate cards just revealed. Discard both edge stacks and start a new edge battle.

title: Lord Vader's Command
text: While this objective is undamaged, increase the cost of each event card played by an opponent by 1.

title: Darth Vader
text:
Elite. (Remove 1 additional focus token from this unit when you refresh.)
While this unit is attacking, each of your attacking units gains [Blast Damage]

keywords.text: Remove 1 additional focus token from this unit when you refresh.

title: Probe Droid
text: Interrupt: When this unit leaves play, deal 1 damage to a target enemy objective.

title: Probe Droid
text: Interrupt: When this unit leaves play, deal 1 damage to a target enemy objective.

title: Imperial Suppression
text: Interrupt: When an event card is played, cancel its effects and place it on top of its owner's deck.

title: Shadows on the Ice
text: Limit 1 per objective deck.

title: Wampa
text: Reduce the cost to play this unit by 2 for each Hoth objective in play.

title: Wampa
text: Reduce the cost to play this unit by 2 for each Hoth objective in play.

title: Succumb to the Cold!
text:
Play only if you control at least 1 Hoth objective.
Reaction: After a focus token is removed from an enemy unit, place 1 focus token on that unit.

title: Succumb to the Cold!
text:
Play only if you control at least 1 Hoth objective.
Reaction: After a focus token is removed from an enemy unit, place 1 focus token on that unit.

title: Battle of Hoth
text: You may deal 1 damage to or remove 1 damage from a target Hoth objective.
